com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.packet

Class ByteBufferReceivablePacket

  • com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.packet.ByteBufferReceivablePacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReceivablePacket

    public class ByteBufferReceivablePacket
implements ReceivablePacket

    A interface ReceivablePacket backed by a ByteBuffer.

    See Also:
    interface ReceivablePacket, ByteBuffer

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.packet.ReceivablePacket

      Constructors

      A interface ReceivablePacket backed by a ByteBuffer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears this packet and prepares it for reuse. This allows usage of packet pooling to improve performance.
      void prepareRead()
      Prepares this packet for reading. ie a ByteBuffer-backed packet would call ByteBuffer.flip
      void put(byte p)
      Put a byte into this packet.
      byte readByte()
      Reads a Byte from this packet.
      char readChar()
      Reads a Char from this packet.
      double readDouble()
      Reads a Double from this packet.
      float readFloat()
      Reads a Float from this packet.
      int readInt()
      Reads an Int from this packet.
      long readLong()
      Reads a Long from this packet.
      short readShort()
      Reads a Short from this packet.
      java.lang.String readString()
      Reads a String from this packet.

        public ByteBufferReceivablePacket(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)

        A interface ReceivablePacket backed by a ByteBuffer.

        Parameters:
